Package org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core.api

Core binding-independent SAL contracts and components

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Broker
    Core component of the SAL layer responsible for wiring the SAL consumers.
    Broker.ConsumerSession
    Consumer specific access to the SAL functionality.
    Broker.ProviderSession
    Provider specific access to the SAL functionality.
    Broker.RoutedRpcRegistration  
    Broker.RpcRegistration  
    BrokerService
    Session-specific instance of the broker functionality.
    Consumer
    Defines the component of controller and supplies additional metadata.
    Consumer.ConsumerFunctionality Deprecated
    - no longer used or needed
    Provider
    Defines the component of controller and supplies additional metadata.
    Provider.ProviderFunctionality Deprecated
    - no longer used or needed
    RoutedRpcDefaultImplementation  
    RpcConsumptionRegistry  
    RpcImplementation
    Provider's implementation of an RPC.
    RpcProvisionRegistry  
    RpcRegistrationListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractConsumer  
    AbstractProvider  
    RpcRoutingContext  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    RpcImplementationUnavailableException
    Exception reported when no RPC implementation is found in the system.
